text: <@U02F8TTPU>: FYI Andy is adding a few small issues to Sprint 6 so keep your eye out
ok, will work through them as they pop up

Almost all the current jira issues done! I found some tutorials on parallax/crossfade animations in viewpagers, and that was easier to implement than I had previously thought (since there are only 3 elements to animate, the artwork, copy and background).
I re-tested locking/unlocking screen while running dandelion, and it reloaded for me (as it should) so I'll wait to hear back from them on issue DTHDR-47
Also once we get connected with those guys on slack I can ask specifically about that issue.
